ADAPt.name: ADAPt
ADAPt.description: Convert '''all''' of your {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} into {{as|ability power}} at a rate of {{as|1 ability power|ap}} per {{as|{{fd|0.6}} '''bonus''' attack damage|ad}}. Additionally, increase your {{as|ability power by 15%}}.

Adamant.name: Adamant
Adamant.description: {{tip|immobilize|Immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} an enemy champion grants {{pp|2 to 10}} {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}} for 10 seconds, stacking up to 10 times for a total of {{pp|2*10 to 10*10}} '''bonus''' resistances, and refreshing on subsequent triggers.

Buff Buddies.name: Buff Buddies
Buff Buddies.description: Grants {{bi|Crest of Cinders}} and {{bi|Crest of Insight}} permanently.

Dive Bomber.name: Dive Bomber
Dive Bomber.description: Upon death, you explode to deal {{as|true damage}} equal to {{as|20% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} to enemies within 500 units.

Don't Blink.name: Don't Blink
Don't Blink.description: Deal 1% increased damage per {{as|10 movement speed}} you have more than the target.

Erosion.name: Erosion
Erosion.description: Each instance of damage dealt to an enemy reduces their {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} by {{fd|1.5}}% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 20 times for a total of 30% resistances reduction.

Escape Plan.name: Escape Plan
Escape Plan.description: Upon dropping below {{as|35% of your '''maximum''' health}}, gain a {{tip|shield}} for {{as|65% of your '''maximum''' health}}, {{as|150% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, and reduced size (75 second cooldown). These effects all decay over {{fd|5.5}} seconds.

Fetch.name: Fetch
Fetch.description:
Gain {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}} towards enemies marked by {{si|Mark}}. Additionally, nearby allied champions that use {{si|Mark}} will cause it to drop a snowball on the ground after reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy. You can pick up this snowball to refresh the cooldown of your {{si|Mark}}.

{{as|'''This augment is currently disabled.'''|buzzword3}}

Flashbang.name: Flashbang
Flashbang.description: Using {{si|Flash}} creates an explosion around the blink location that deals {{as|{{pp|70 to 240}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 70% AD)}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 35% for {{fd|1.25}} seconds. Additionally, the cooldown of your {{si|Flash}} resets upon your death.

Frost Wraith.name: Frost Wraith
Frost Wraith.description: Automatically cast {{cai|Ring of Frost|Lissandra}}, creating a cold pulse around you in 450 radius that {{tip|root|roots}} nearby enemies for {{fd|1.25}} seconds ({{fd|6.5}} second cooldown).

Guilty Pleasure.name: Guilty Pleasure
Guilty Pleasure.description: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} an enemy champion {{tip|heal|heals}} you for {{pp|10 to 150}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% '''maximum''' health)}} (5 second cooldown per {{tip|cast instance}}).

Hat on a Hat.name: Hat on a Hat
Hat on a Hat.description: Gain {{as|15 ability power}} and {{as|8 '''bonus''' magic resistance}} for each headwear item or hat you have in your inventory, reduced to {{as|8 ability power}} and {{as|4 '''bonus''' magic resistance}} for hats obtained from {{ii|Cappa Juice}} and {{ii|Stat Bonus}}.

Heavy Hitter.name: Heavy Hitter
Heavy Hitter.description: Basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} equal to {{as|{{fd|3.5}}% of your '''maximum''' health}}.

Homeguard.name: Homeguard
Homeguard.description: Gain {{as|100% '''bonus''' movement speed}}. This bonus is lost for 3 seconds after taking damage from champions.

Ice Cold.name: Ice Cold
Ice Cold.description: Your {{tip|slow|slowing}} effects reduce the {{as|movement speed}} of targets by an additional {{as|100|ms}}.

Infernal Soul.name: Infernal Soul
Infernal Soul.description: Grants the {{bi|Infernal Dragon Soul}}, or a different {{bi|Dragon Soul}} if one is already obtained.

Light 'em Up!.name: Light 'em Up!
Light 'em Up!.description: Basic attacks generate a stack, up to 4. The fourth stack consumes them all to quickly launch 4 fireworks at the target that each deal {{as|{{pp|11 to 80}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 35% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 19% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit, for a total of {{as|{{pp|11*4 to 80*4}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|35*4}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|19*4}}% AP)}}.

Mountain Soul.name: Mountain Soul
Mountain Soul.description: Grants the {{bi|Mountain Dragon Soul}}, or a different {{bi|Dragon Soul}} if one is already obtained.

Mighty Shield.name: Mighty Shield
Mighty Shield.description: Gain {{pp|40 to 100}} {{tip|adaptive force}} for 3 seconds upon gaining a {{tip|shield}} (5 second cooldown).

Ocean Soul.name: Ocean Soul
Ocean Soul.description: Grants the {{bi|Ocean Dragon Soul}}, which has a modified base heal value of 100, or a different {{bi|Dragon Soul}} if one is already obtained.

Poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
Poltergeist.description:
Replaces the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} with ''{{si|Poltergeist}}''.

[[File:Poltergeist augment spell.png|20px|link=]] {{sbc|Poltergeist:}} {{#invoke:SpellData|geteffect|Poltergeist}}

ReEnergize.name: ReEnergize
ReEnergize.description: Your {{tip|Energized}} attacks against targets not hit by your previous ''Energized'' attack do not consume any ''Energize'' stacks on-hit. Additionally, when fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] equal to {{as|10% of the target's '''current''' health}}.

Repulsor.name: Repulsor
Repulsor.description: Upon dropping below {{as|35% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you {{tip|airborne|knock back}} all enemies within a 500 radius by 750 units and {{tip|slow}} them by 90% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds (25 second cooldown, resets upon death).

Self Destruct.name: Self Destruct
Self Destruct.description: Automatically attach a bomb to yourself that detonates after 5 seconds, creating an explosion that deals {{as|true damage}} equal to {{as|20% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} to enemies within 350 units and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds (25 second cooldown).

Shadow Runner.name: Shadow Runner
Shadow Runner.description: After {{tip|dash|dashing}}, {{tip|blink|blinking}}, or exiting {{tip|stealth}}, gain {{as|300 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

Sonic Boom.name: Sonic Boom
Sonic Boom.description: Granting a [[buff]], {{tip|heal}}, or {{tip|shield}} to your ally deals {{as|{{pp|30 to 150}} true damage}} to enemies within 450 units of them and {{tip|slow|slows}} targets by 30% for 2 seconds (2 second cooldown).

Spin To Win.name: Spin To Win
Spin To Win.description: Your {{tt|spinning abilities|Any ability with 'spinning' properties}} deal 30% increased damage and benefit from 30 ability haste.

Swift and Safe.name: Swift and Safe
Swift and Safe.description: After {{tip|dash|dashing}} or {{tip|blink|blinking}}, gain a {{tip|shield}} that lasts for 2 seconds and absorbs {{pp|65 to 290}} {{as|(+ 65% AD)}} {{as|(+ 26% AP)}} damage (5 second cooldown).

Tank It Or Leave It.name: Tank It Or Leave It
Tank It Or Leave It.icon: Tank It Or Leave It augment.png
Tank It Or Leave It.description:
Gain ''Critical Defend Chance'' equal to {{as|100% critical strike chance}}, up to 50%. Additionally, gain {{as|25% critical strike chance}}.

{{sbc|Critical Defend Chance:}} Grants you a chance to reduce an instance of damage taken by 20%.

The Brutalizer.name: The Brutalizer
The Brutalizer.description: Grants {{as|25 '''bonus''' attack damage}}, {{as|10 ability haste}}, and {{as|5 lethality}}.

Tormentor.name: Tormentor
Tormentor.description: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} an enemy champion inflicts them with a {{as|Burn}} for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} equal to{{ft|{{as|{{ap|4/5}}% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} per second|{{as|4% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} over the duration}}(5 second cooldown per {{tip|cast instance}}). This {{as|Burn}} stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application.

Transmute: Gold.name: Transmute: Gold
Transmute: Gold.description: Gain one random Gold augment, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.

Typhoon.name: Typhoon
Typhoon.description: Basic attacks fire a bolt at an additional target that deals {{as|30% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

Ultimate Unstoppable.name: Ultimate Unstoppable
Ultimate Unstoppable.description: Casting your ultimate ability grants you {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}} for 3 seconds (8 second cooldown).

Upgrade Collector.name: Upgrade Collector
Upgrade Collector.description: Upgrades {{ii|The Collector}}, empowering {{nie|Death}} to have its execution threshold increased by {{fd|0.5}}% each time you kill an enemy champion, capped at a threshold of {{as|10% of the target's '''maximum''' health}}, and {{nie|Taxes}} to generate a further {{g|25}} (total {{g|50}}) from kills. Additionally, gain {{g|250}}.

Upgrade Cutlass.name: Upgrade Cutlass
Upgrade Cutlass.description: Upgrades both {{ii|Lifeline}} and {{ii|Spectral Cutlass}}, reducing the cooldown of {{nie|Soul Anchor}} to 30 seconds and empowering its active to grant you 25% increased damage while it is in effect. Additionally, gain {{g|250}}.

Upgrade Immolate.name: Upgrade Immolate
Upgrade Immolate.description:
Upgrades {{ii|Bami's Cinder}}, {{ii|Hollow Radiance}}, and {{ii|Sunfire Aegis}}, empowering {{nie|Immolate}} to additionally grant you {{g|10}} per tick for each enemy champion afflicted by its effect. Additionally, gain {{g|250}}.

''{{tip|Clones}} do not count as valid targets for the effect.''

Upgrade Zhonya's.name: Upgrade Zhonya's
Upgrade Zhonya's.description: Upgrades {{ii|Seeker's Armguard}}, {{ii|Wooglet's Witchcap}}, and {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}, empowering {{nie|Stasis}} to allow you to move during its active effect. Additionally, the cooldown of {{iis|Zhonya's Hourglass}} Stasis is reduced to 45 seconds.

Veil of Warding.name: Veil of Warding
Veil of Warding.description: Grants a {{tip|spell shield}} that blocks the next hostile ability (30 second cooldown, timer does '''not''' restart from champion damage taken).

Wind Beneath Blade.name: Wind Beneath Blade
Wind Beneath Blade.description: Gain {{as|{{fd|1.5}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} per 1 {{as|Lethality}} or {{as|flat magic penetration}}, and {{as|5 '''bonus''' movement speed}} per 10% {{as|armor penetration}} or {{as|magic penetration}}.

EscAPADe.name: EscAPADe
EscAPADe.description: Convert '''all''' of your {{as|ability power}} into {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} at a rate of {{as|1 '''bonus''' attack damage|ad}} per {{as|{{fd|1.66}} ability power|ap}}. Additionally, increase your {{as|'''total''' attack damage by 15%}}.

All For You.name: All For You
All For You.description: Your {{tip|heals}} and {{tip|shields}} on allied champions are increased in effectiveness by 30%.

Apex Inventor.name: Apex Inventor
Apex Inventor.description: Grants {{as|100 item haste|ability haste}}, which is equivalent to 50% cooldown reduction for items.

Big Brain.name: Big Brain
Big Brain.description: Gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs damage equal to {{as|300% AP}} and lasts until destroyed. Shield is replenished upon respawn.

Bread And Butter.name: Bread And Butter
Bread And Butter.description: Your champion's first basic ability ''(Q)'' gains {{as|100 ability haste}}.

Bread And Cheese.name: Bread And Cheese
Bread And Cheese.description: Your champion's third basic ability ''(E)'' gains {{as|100 ability haste}}.

Bread And Jam.name: Bread And Jam
Bread And Jam.description: Your champion's second basic ability ''(W)'' gains {{as|100 ability haste}}.

Celestial Body.name: Celestial Body
Celestial Body.description: Gain {{as|1250 '''bonus''' health}}, but reduce your damage output by 10%.

Cheating.name: Cheating
Cheating.description: Your {{si|Recall}} is now functional and is upgraded to {{si|Empowered Recall}}. Additionally, you no longer lose the ability to purchase [[item]]s from the [[shop]]  after exiting the shop area, and the fountain will now provide healing and resource restoration for you.

Critical Healing.name: Critical Healing
Critical Healing.description: Your {{tip|heals}} and {{tip|shields}} now have a chance equal to your {{sti|critical strike chance|{{as|critical strike chance}}}} to increase in effectiveness by 40%. Additionally, gain {{as|25% critical strike chance}}.

Critical Rhythm.name: Critical Rhythm
Critical Rhythm.description: Your {{tip|critical strikes}} grant you {{as|6% '''bonus''' attack speed}} for 6 seconds, stacking up to 10 times for a total of {{as|60%|attack speed}}. Additionally, gain {{as|25% critical strike chance}}.

Dawnbringer's Resolve.name: Dawnbringer's Resolve
Dawnbringer's Resolve.description: Upon dropping below {{as|50% '''maximum''' health}}, you are {{tip|heal|healed}} for {{as|30% '''maximum''' health}} over 3 seconds (45 second cooldown, reset upon death).

Demon's Dance.name: Demon's Dance
Demon's Dance.description: Gain the {{ri|Fleet Footwork}} and {{ri|Grasp of the Undying}} keystone runes.

Divine Intervention.name: Divine Intervention
Divine Intervention.description: Automatically cast {{cai|Cosmic Radiance|Taric}}, calling down a protective star upon you that descends over {{fd|2.5}} seconds. Afterwards, you and all allied champions within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 400 units become {{tip|invulnerable}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds (35 second cooldown).

Ethereal Weapon.name: Ethereal Weapon
Ethereal Weapon.description: Your abilities apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness (1 second cooldown per target).

Executioner.name: Executioner
Executioner.description: Deal 10% increased damage to enemies below {{as|30% of their '''maximum''' health}}. Scoring a champion {{tip|takedown}} resets the cooldown of all your basic abilities.

Firebrand.name: Firebrand
Firebrand.description: Basic attacks apply a {{as|Burn}} for 5 seconds that deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} equal to{{ft|{{as|{{ap|2/5}}% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} per second.|{{as|2% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} over the duration.}}This {{as|Burn}} stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application.

Flash 2.name: Flash 2
Flash 2.description:
Replaces the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} with ''{{si|Flash}}''. Additionally, gain 70 summoner spell haste.

''You have {{si|Flash}} in both of your summoner spell slots while equipped with this augment, and they do not share cooldowns when either of them are used.''

Flashy.name: Flashy
Flashy.description:
Your {{si|Flash}} now has 3 charges with a 2-second cooldown between casts (120 seconds recharge time for all 3 charges).

{{as|'''This augment is currently disabled.'''|buzzword3}}

From Beginning to End.name: From Beginning to End
From Beginning to End.description: Gain the {{ri|Dark Harvest}} and {{ri|First Strike}} keystone runes.

Get Excited.name: Get Excited
Get Excited.description: Scoring a champion {{tip|takedown}} grants you {{as|100% '''bonus''' movement speed}} and {{as|15% '''total''' attack speed}} for 4 seconds.

Holy Fire.name: Holy Fire
Holy Fire.description:
Your {{tip|heals}} and {{tip|shields}} cause you to fire a missile to the nearest enemy champion within 650 units over {{fd|0.32}} seconds, applying a {{as|Burn}} upon arrival that deals {{as|magic damage}} equal to {{as|{{fd|0.2}}% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} every second over 5 seconds, for a total of {{as|1%|hp}} ({{fd|1.5}}-second cooldown).

The {{as|Burn's}} per-tick damage increases to up to {{as|{{fd|0.8}}% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} based on the relative value of the triggering heal or shield against the {{as|'''maximum''' health}} of the ally recipient, for a total maximum damage of {{as|4% of the target's '''maximum''' health}}.

Impassable.name: Impassable
Impassable.description: Gain the {{ri|Aftershock}} and {{ri|Glacial Augment}} keystone runes.

It's Killing Time.name: It's Killing Time
It's Killing Time.description: Upon casting your ultimate ability, you apply {{cai|Death Mark|Zed}} to all enemy champions (8 second cooldown). The mark stores 40% of all {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated before modifiers}} damage you deal to the affected target, detonating after 5 seconds to deal {{as|true damage}} equal to the damage stored against them.

Keystone Conjurer.name: Keystone Conjurer
Keystone Conjurer.description: Gain the {{ri|Arcane Comet}} and {{ri|Summon Aery}} keystone runes.

Lightning Strikes.name: Lightning Strikes
Lightning Strikes.description: Increase your {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} gained from all sources by {{as|20%|as}}. While at {{as|{{fd|3.5}}|as}} attack speed or higher, your basic attacks deal {{as|40 '''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit.

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description: Dealing damage to an enemy champion with an ability within 1000 units fires 3 missiles at them that each deal {{as|true damage}} equal to {{as|{{fd|0.3{{recurring|3}}}}% of the target's '''maximum''' health}}, increased to up to {{as|1%|health}} based on distance travelled. This effect can only trigger once every 6 seconds from the same cast.

Marksmage.name: Marksmage
Marksmage.description: Basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} equal to {{as|75% AP}}.

Minionmancer.name: Minionmancer
Minionmancer.description: Your {{tip|pet|pets}} deal 40% increased damage as well as gain 40% {{as|'''bonus''' health}} and size.

Nightstalking.name: Nightstalking
Nightstalking.description: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them renders you {{tip|invisible}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Attacking or casting abilites ends the stealth immediately.

OK Boomerang.name: OK Boomerang
OK Boomerang.description: Automatically cast {{cai|Boomerang Blade|Sivir}} at the closest nearby enemy champion within 1250 units, dealing {{pp|40 to 200}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|adaptive damage}} to enemies hit (10 second cooldown).

Outlaw's Grit.name: Outlaw's Grit
Outlaw's Grit.description: {{tip|Dash|Dashing}} or {{tip|blink|blinking}} grants 12 {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}, stacking up to 5 times for a total of 60 '''bonus''' resistances. Stacks are reset every 60 seconds since acquiring the augment.

Overflow.name: Overflow
Overflow.description: Your abilities' {{as|mana}} costs are doubled, but you also gain 10% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per 100 '''maximum''' mana)|mana}} increased damage as well as self and outgoing {{tip|heal|healing}} and {{tip|shield|shielding}}.

Perseverance.name: Perseverance
Perseverance.description: Grants {{as|800% '''base''' health regeneration}}, increased to {{as|1600%|health}} while below {{as|25% '''maximum''' health}}.

Rabble Rousing.name: Rabble Rousing
Rabble Rousing.description: Casting an ability {{tip|heal|heals}} you for {{pp|5 to 60}} {{as|(+ 1% '''maximum''' health)}}.

Restless Restoration.name: Restless Restoration
Restless Restoration.description: {{tip|Heal}} for {{pp|20/100 to 120/100}} {{as|(+ {{ap|1/100}}% '''maximum''' health)}} per 10 units travelled.

Searing Dawn.name: Searing Dawn
Searing Dawn.description:
Gain {{cai|Sunlight|Leona}}.

{{sbc|Sunlight:}} Your abilities mark enemies, causing them to take {{as|{{pp|40 to 200}}|magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} from your ally's next basic attack or ability hit against them ({{fd|0.75}}-second cooldown per target).

Shrink Ray.name: Shrink Ray
Shrink Ray.description: Basic attacks reduce the target's damage dealt by 15% for 3 seconds, refreshing with each hit. Their size is also reduced significantly for the duration.

Skilled Sniper.name: Skilled Sniper
Skilled Sniper.description: Hitting an enemy champion with a basic ability while located at least {{tip|er|icononly=true}} 700 units away from them at the time of the hit reduces its '''current''' cooldown by 80% of its '''total''' cooldown, modified to 65% for [[damage over time]] abilities.

Slow and Steady.name: Slow and Steady
Slow and Steady.description: Your {{sti|attack speed|{{as|'''base''' attack speed}}}} is set to a static amount of {{as|{{fd|0.625}}|as}} and your attack rate no longer benefits from any source of attack speed bonuses. In return, you gain {{as|25 '''bonus''' attack damage}} and convert every {{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}} into {{as|1 '''bonus''' attack damage}}.

Snowball Upgrade.name: Snowball Upgrade
Snowball Upgrade.description: Your {{si|Mark}} is empowered to hail a snowstorm at the location where the target was hit for 2 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area and dealing {{as|200|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within over the duration, as well as {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}}. Additionally, your {{sis|Mark}} cooldown is reduced equivalent to 100 ability haste.

Soul Siphon.name: Soul Siphon
Soul Siphon.description: Your {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} {{tip|heal}} you for 12% of damage dealt. Additionally, gain {{as|25% critical strike chance}}.

Spiritual Purification.name: Spiritual Purification
Spiritual Purification.description: Scoring a champion {{tip|takedown}} causes the area around the slain champion to explode in a 500 unit radius, dealing {{tip|adaptive damage}} to enemies within equal to {{as|15% of their '''current''' health}} and leaving behind a zone for {{fd|1.5}} seconds that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies within by 60%.

Tank Engine.name: Tank Engine
Tank Engine.description: Scoring a champion {{tip|takedown}} generates a stack, stacking infinitely. For each stack, increase your {{as|'''maximum''' health}} and [[size]] by 5%. Lose 65% of stacks on death.

Transmute: Prismatic.name: Transmute: Prismatic
Transmute: Prismatic.description: Gain one random Prismatic augment, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.

Twice Thrice.name: Twice Thrice
Twice Thrice.description: Basic attacks generate a stack, up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, your next basic attack consumes all stacks to apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects again at 150% effectiveness.

Upgrade Hubris.name: Upgrade Hubris
Upgrade Hubris.description: Upgrades {{ii|Hubris}}, empowering {{nie|Eminence}} to {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|{{fd|2.5}}%|health}} (+ {{fd|0.5}}% per stack) {{as|'''maximum''' health}} upon being triggered and grant you {{as|10|ms}} (+ 5 per stack) {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for its duration. Additionally, gain {{g|250}}.

Upgrade Infinity Edge.name: Upgrade Infinity Edge
Upgrade Infinity Edge.description:
Upgrades {{ii|Infinity Edge}}, empowering it to gain {{iis|Sword of the Divine}} {{nie|Excoriate}}. Additionally, gain {{g|500}} and {{as|25% critical strike chance}}.

{{sbc|Excoriate:}} Gain a random amount of {{as|'''bonus''' critical strike damage|critical damage}} that scales up to {{as|50% of your critical strike chance}}, with the value of this amount changing every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

Upgrade Sheen.name: Upgrade Sheen
Upgrade Sheen.description: Upgrades all {{tip|Spellblade}} items, empowering the passive effect to deal additional {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} equal to {{as|4% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} and {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|{{fd|3.5}}% of your '''maximum''' health}}. Additionally, gain {{g|250}}.

Vampirism.name: Vampirism
Vampirism.description: You can no longer be {{tip|heal|healed}} by allies and your {{as|health regeneration}} is set to {{as|0|hp}}. Gain {{as|30% omnivamp}}.

Vulnerability.name: Vulnerability
Vulnerability.description: Damage dealt by items and damage over time effects can now {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for (145% + {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' critical damage}}}}) damage. Additionally, gain {{as|25% critical strike chance}}.

With Haste.name: With Haste
With Haste.description: Grants {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} equal to {{as|100% ability haste}}.

I'm a Baby Kitty Where is Mama.name: I'm a Baby Kitty Where is Mama
I'm a Baby Kitty Where is Mama.icon: I'm a Baby Kitty Where is Mama augment.png
I'm a Baby Kitty Where is Mama.description:
Bind with the nearest allied champion to you after 2 seconds, forming a {{tip|tether}} between you and them (400 radius). While the tether persists, you gain {{as|75% '''bonus''' movement speed}} and {{as|50% heal and shield power}}. Additionally, gain {{as|{{fd|37.5}}% '''bonus''' movement speed}} while facing your bound ally within 1500 units.

''The tether will break when you or your bound ally dies, allowing you to form a new tether.''

Back to Basics.name: Back to Basics
Back to Basics.description: Your [[champion ability|champion abilities]] deal 35% increased damage and you gain {{as|70 ability haste}} and 35% increased {{tip|heal|healing}} and {{tip|shield|shielding}} from all sources, but your ultimate ability is permanently {{tip|lockout|sealed}}.

Biggest Snowball Ever.name: Biggest Snowball Ever
Biggest Snowball Ever.description:
Upgrades your {{si|Mark}} into a massive snowball, empowering it with an increased size radius and the ability to pass through non-champions. The snowball additionally explodes upon impact of the target hit to deal {{as|{{pp|200 to 350}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies, {{tip|airborne|knock them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, and {{tip|slow}} them by 20% for 2 seconds. Additionally, your {{sis|Mark}} cooldown is reduced equivalent to 100 ability haste.

''If {{si|Mark}} is not equipped, the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} is replaced with {{si|Mark}}. Non-champions hit are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.''

Blade Waltz.name: Blade Waltz
Blade Waltz.description:
Replaces the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} with ''{{si|Blade Waltz}}''.

[[File:Blade Waltz augment spell.png|20px|link=]] {{sbc|Blade Waltz:}} {{#invoke:SpellData|geteffect|Blade Waltz}}

Can't Touch This.name: Can't Touch This
Can't Touch This.description: Casting your ultimate grants you {{tip|invulnerability}} for 2 seconds (8 second cooldown).

Circle of Death.name: Circle of Death
Circle of Death.description: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} and {{stil|health regeneration}} you do causes you to deal 70% of that value in {{as|magic damage}} to the nearest enemy champion within 1000 units.

Clown College.name: Clown College
Clown College.description:
Gain {{cis|Shaco}} {{ai|Backstab|Shaco}}, {{ai|Deceive|Shaco}} and {{ais|Hallucinate|Shaco}} explosion. Replaces the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} with ''{{ai|Deceive|Shaco}}''.

[[File:Backstab.png|20px|link=]] {{sbc|Passive - Backstab:}} Your basic attacks deal {{as|{{pp|20 to 35}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}} {{ccs|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}|physical}} on-hit when hitting an enemy from behind.

[[File:Deceive.png|20px|link=]] {{sbc|Active - Deceive:}} Become {{tip|invisible}} for up to 3 seconds and {{tip|blink}} to the target location within 400 units after a {{fd|0.125}}-second delay. Your next basic attack while in stealth deals {{as|100|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 55% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, increased to{{ft|{{as|{{ap|100*1.55}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|150*1.55}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|55*1.55}}% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}|155% damage}}if [[File:Backstab.png|20px|link=]] ''Backstab'' was applied (45 second cooldown).

[[File:Hallucinate.png|20px|link=]] {{sbc|Passive - Hallucinate:}} Upon your death, release an explosion in a {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 350 radius of your death location, dealing {{as|25% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|true damage}} to enemies within. Additionally, you deploy a {{ai|Jack in the Box|Shaco|box}} at the location of your death that instantly {{tip|fear|fears}} nearby enemies for 1 second. This box does not attack but lasts for 3 seconds.

Courage of the Colossus.name: Courage of the Colossus
Courage of the Colossus.description: {{tip|immobilize|Immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} an enemy champion grants a {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds that absorbs {{pp|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 5% '''maximum''' health)}} damage (5 second cooldown per {{tip|cast instance}}). Shields can stack between multiple triggers of this effect, though not refreshing the duration of previous shields.

Cruelty.name: Cruelty
Cruelty.description: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} an enemy champion summons a comet above them that lands at their current location after 1 second, dealing {{as|{{pp|50 to 150}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|(+ 4% of your '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area (6 second cooldown per target per {{tip|cast instance}}).

Dashing.name: Dashing
Dashing.description:
Abilities with {{tip|dash|dashes}} or {{tip|blink|blinks}} gain {{as|175 ability haste}}.

{{ci|Kalista}} is granted {{as|125% '''bonus''' attack speed}} instead.[https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Tnm4B6E5a]

Draw Your Sword.name: Draw Your Sword
Draw Your Sword.description:
Become {{tip|melee}}, modifying your attack range to 200 units. Additionally, gain {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack damage}}, {{as|25% '''bonus''' attack speed}}, {{as|30% '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|25% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, and 20% life steal. These bonuses are increased by {{pp|key=%|type=champion's default attack range|0 to 30 for 11|500 to 650|formula=3% for every 15 attack range starting from 500 attack range and with the maximum at 650 range}}.

''This augment is only available for {{tip|ranged}} champions.''

Dual Wield.name: Dual Wield
Dual Wield.description: Your basic attacks launch a bolt at the target that fires after a {{tt|{{fd|0.225}}-second delay|Estimated}} {{tip|on-attack}}, deals 40% of the triggering attack's {{tt|pre-mitigation|Damage calculated before modifiers}} damage, and applies on-hit effects at 40% effectiveness. Additionally, increase your {{as|'''total''' attack speed}} by {{as|20%|attack speed}}.

Empyrean Promise.name: Empyrean Promise
Empyrean Promise.description:
Replaces the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} with ''{{iis|Empyrean Promise}}'' {{nie|Vigilance}} active. Additionally, gain {{as|15% heal and shield power}}.

{{sbc|Active - Vigilance:}} {{tip|Dash}} to the target allied champion and upon arrival grant yourself and them a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|100 to 250}} {{as|(+ 100% of your AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% of your '''bonus''' health)}} damage for 3 seconds (30 second cooldown; 2000 range).

Fan the Hammer.name: Fan the Hammer
Fan the Hammer.description: Your next basic attack in each cardinal direction within {{sti|attack range|750 range}} additionally on-attack fires 5 bolts at the target that each deal {{as|{{pp|10 to 52.5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}}, for a total of {{as|{{pp|10*5 to 52.5*5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|15*5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} (5 second cooldown per direction). Bolts' damage is increased by {{pp|type=distance travelled|0 to 50 for 11|0 to 750|key=%}}. Each bolt can {{tip|critically strike}} and applies on-hit effects at 20% effectiveness.

Feel the Burn.name: Feel the Burn
Feel the Burn.description:
Replaces the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} with ''{{si|Feel the Burn}}''. Additionally, {{si|Ignite}} counts as a {{as|Burn}} source.

[[File:Feel the Burn augment spell.png|20px|link=]] {{sbc|Feel the Burn:}} Casts both {{si|Exhaust}} and {{si|Ignite}} on all enemy champions within 800 units, with the former having its {{tip|slow}} strength increased to 50% and the latter modified to deal {{as|{{pp|70 to 410}} true damage}} over the duration.

Fey Magic.name: Fey Magic
Fey Magic.description: Damaging enemies with your ultimate ability {{tip|polymorph|polymorphs}} them into harmless critters for 2 seconds, during which their {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} is reduced by {{as|60|ms}}, and {{tip|disarm|disarms}} them for the same duration (15 second cooldown per target).

Final Form.name: Final Form
Final Form.description: Casting your ultimate ability empowers you for 10 seconds, causing you to gain a {{tip|shield}} for {{as|50% of your '''maximum''' health}}, {{as|20% omnivamp}}, and {{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for the duration (20 second cooldown).

Gash.name: Gash
Gash.description: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{as|{{rd|20 to 40|10 to 20|pp=true}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{rd|25%|20%}} '''bonus''' armor)|armor}} {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}. Additionally, gain {{as|50% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.

Giant Slayer.name: Giant Slayer
Giant Slayer.description: Become tiny, reducing your size by 75% and gaining {{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}. Additionally, deal {{pp|key=%|type=target's size|10;15;25;30|Small;Medium;Large;Extra Large}} '''bonus''' damage against enemy champions with greater size than you.

Glass Cannon.name: Glass Cannon
Glass Cannon.description: You gain a [[Health#Health_threshold|health threshold]] equal to {{sti|{{as|70% '''maximum''' health}}}} which cannot be {{tt|modified|By increases or decreases to maximum health}} nor {{tt|exceeded|By healing and health regeneration}} by any means. In return, you deal {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} equal to 15% of all of the damage you deal {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}}.

Goldrend.name: Goldrend
Goldrend.description: Damaging an enemy champion with a basic attack or ability deals them an additional {{as|{{pp|50 to 150}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, and grants you {{g|15}} and {{as|25% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds (30 second cooldown per champion).

Goliath.name: Goliath
Goliath.description: Grants {{as|35% '''bonus''' health}}, 15% {{tip|adaptive force}}, and 50% increased size.

Infernal Conduit.name: Infernal Conduit
Infernal Conduit.description:
Your ability hits against champions apply a {{as|Burn}} for 5 seconds that deals{{ft|{{pp|6/5 to 60/5|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|14/5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6/5}}% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} per second|{{pp|6 to 60|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 14% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 6% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} over the duration}}(1 second cooldown per {{tip|cast instance}}). This {{as|Burn}} stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application.

Additionally, all of your {{as|Burn}} effects reduce the cooldowns of all your basic abilities by {{fd|0.08}} seconds for each tick of damage they deal to a target.

Jeweled Gauntlet.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
Jeweled Gauntlet.description:
Your abilities can now {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for (145% + {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' critical damage}}}}) damage. Additionally, gain {{as|25%|critical strike chance}} {{as|(+ {{fd|4.5}}% per 100 AP)}} {{as|critical strike chance}}.

If both ''Jeweled Gauntlet'' and [[File:Vulnerability augment.png|20px|link=|An icon for the ARAM: Mayhem augment Vulnerability]] ''Vulnerability'' are equipped, only rolls the critical strike chance of the augment that has the higher critical damage (or either if equal).

King Me.name: King Me
King Me.description:
Upon entering the enemy team's {{tip|warp gate|gate}} or [[Catapult]] for the first time, either of which are located near their [[spawn]], you become [[File:King Me buff.png|20px|link=]] {{as|Kinged|buzzword5}}, causing you to gain one random Prismatic-tier augment and the first eligible [[Legendary item]] in your inventory to be upgraded to its {{sbc|{{ai|Living Forge|Ornn|Masterwork}}}} variant. The [[Gold efficiency (League of Legends)|gold value]] of all {{tt|upgradeable stats|Includes AH, AP, AD, AS, AR, MR, and HP}} on the item is increased by exactly {{g|1000}}.

''King Me prioritize upgrading the first Legendary item eligible for a {{sbc|Masterwork}} upgrade based on its position in the inventory, detecting each slot until an eligible item is found.''

Laser Heal.name: Laser Heal
Laser Heal.description:
Replaces the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} with ''{{si|Laser Heal}}''.

[[File:Life Form Disintegration Ray.png|20px|link=]] {{sbc|Laser Heal:}} {{#invoke:SpellData|geteffect|Laser Heal}}

Mad Scientist.name: Mad Scientist
Mad Scientist.description: Upon acquiring this augment and each time you respawn, gain either 30% {{tip|adaptive force}}, {{as|20% '''bonus''' health}}, and 40% increased size or {{as|70 ability haste}}, {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, and 40% reduced size.

Master of Duality.name: Master of Duality
Master of Duality.description: Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} grant {{as|{{pp|6 to 18}} ability power}} and damaging abilities once per {{tip|cast instance}} grant {{as|{{pp|3 to 9}} '''bonus''' attack damage}}, lasting for 5 seconds, with the duration of both refreshing on subsequent hits, and stacking infinitely.

Mystic Punch.name: Mystic Punch
Mystic Punch.description: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] reduce the cooldowns of your [[Champion ability|basic abilities]] by {{sti|cdr|20% of their '''remaining''' cooldown}}, with a minimum of {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

Ominous Pact.name: Ominous Pact
Ominous Pact.description: Your abilities now have a {{tip|health resource|health cost}} of {{as|5% '''current''' health}} to cast them. In return, you gain {{as|ability power}} based on your {{as|'''missing''' health}}, up to {{as|{{pp|75 to 150}}|AP}} at {{as|70% '''missing''' health}}, {{pp|key=%|key1=%|type='''missing''' health|0 to 50 for 11|0 to 70|formula=0.714% per 1% '''missing''' health, capped at 70% '''missing''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}, and {{pp|key=%|key1=%|type='''missing''' health|0 to 20 for 11|0 to 70|formula=0.286% per 1% '''missing''' health, capped at 70% '''missing''' health}} {{as|omnivamp}}.

Protein Shake.name: Protein Shake
Protein Shake.description: Gain {{as|25%|heal and shield power}} {{as|(+ 35% per 100 '''bonus''' armor)}} {{as|(+ 35% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}} {{as|heal and shield power}}.

Quantum Computing.name: Quantum Computing
Quantum Computing.description: Automatically cast an improved version of {{cai|Tactical Sweep|Camille}} when an enemy champion is within 650 units of you, winding up over {{fd|0.75}} seconds to slash in a 650 radius around you. The slash deals {{as|{{pp|200 to 350}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 65% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within the area (30 second cooldown). Enemies hit by the outer edge of the circle take {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} equal to {{as|10%|hp}} {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.6}}% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}}% per 100 '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|of their '''maximum''' health}} and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 80% decaying over 2 seconds. Additionally, you are {{tip|heal|healed}} for 80% of the '''bonus''' {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} damage against enemy champions hit by the outer edge.

Quest: Sneakerhead.name: Quest: Sneakerhead
Quest: Sneakerhead.description:
You have now been assigned with a number of quests to complete that each involve performing specific tasks while equipped with a particular [https://wiki.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/Category:Boots_items Boots item], which is granted to you for free during its respective quest. Finish the following quests, which are assigned to you in a random order:
  • {{sbc|Quest - {{ii|Berserker's Greaves}}:}} Basic attack 25 times.
  • {{sbc|Quest - {{ii|Boots of Swiftness}}:}} Run 300 steps.
  • {{sbc|Quest - {{ii|Ionian Boots of Lucidity}}:}} Cast 20 abilities.
  • {{sbc|Quest - {{ii|Mercury's Treads}}:}} Become afflicted by {{tip|crowd control}} 5 times.
  • {{sbc|Quest - {{ii|Plated Steelcaps}}:}} Reduce a total of 200 damage with {{nie|Plating}}.
  • {{sbc|Quest - {{ii|Sorcerer's Shoes}}:}} Deal a total of 1500 damage with abilities.

{{sbc|Reward:}} Upon completing all of the above quests, you receive {{ii|Jarvan I's}}.

''You cannot purchase any Boots items while equipped with this augment. If you already have a Boots item, it is replaced by the Boots granted by this effect. Boots items gained from this effect cannot be sold.''

{{as|'''This augment is currently disabled.'''|buzzword3}}

Quest: Steel Your Heart.name: Quest: Steel Your Heart
Quest: Steel Your Heart.description:
{{sbc|Quest:}} Obtain {{ii|Heartsteel}} and accumulate over {{as|300 '''bonus''' health}} from ''Colossal Consumption''.

{{sbc|Reward:}} Upon completing your {{sbc|Quest}}, increase the {{as|'''bonus''' health}} gained from {{iis|Heartsteel}} ''Colossal Consumption'' by 200%.

Quest: Urf's Champion.name: Quest: Urf's Champion
Quest: Urf's Champion.description:
{{sbc|Quest:}} Score 18 champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}}.

{{sbc|Reward:}} Upon completing your {{sbc|Quest}}, you receive {{ii|The Golden Spatula}}.

Quest: Wooglet's Witchcap.name: Quest: Wooglet's Witchcap
Quest: Wooglet's Witchcap.description:
Gain a {{ii|Needlessly Large Rod}}.

{{sbc|Quest:}} Obtain {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcap}} and {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}.

{{sbc|Reward:}} Upon completing your {{sbc|Quest}}, convert the items you obtained for the quest into {{ii|Wooglet's Witchcap}}.

Slow Cooker.name: Slow Cooker
Slow Cooker.description: Surrounds you in flames, causing you to apply a {{as|Burn}} every second to enemy champions within 500 units for 5 seconds that deals {{as|magic damage}} equal to{{ft|{{as|{{ap|1.5/5}}% of your '''maximum''' health}} per second.|{{as|{{fd|1.5}}% of your '''maximum''' health}} over the duration.}}This {{as|Burn}} stacks infinitely and refreshes with each application.

Snowball Roulette.name: Snowball Roulette
Snowball Roulette.description:
Hitting an enemy champion with {{si|Mark}} casts a random harmful summoner spell on them, and also casts a random beneficial summoner spell on yourself. Using {{si|Dash}} casts the beneficial summoner spell on yourself again upon arrival. Additionally, your {{sis|Mark}} cooldown is reduced equivalent to 100 ability haste.

''Harmful summoner spells include {{si|Exhaust}} and {{si|Ignite}}, while beneficial ones consist of {{si|Barrier}}, {{si|Clarity}}, {{si|Cleanse}}, {{si|Ghost}}, and {{si|Heal}}. If {{si|Mark}} is not equipped, the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} is replaced with {{si|Mark}}.''

Symphony of War.name: Symphony of War
Symphony of War.description: Gain the {{ri|Conqueror}} and {{ri|Lethal Tempo}} keystone runes.

Tap Dancer.name: Tap Dancer
Tap Dancer.description: Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} against enemy champions and minions grant {{as|10 '''bonus''' movement speed}}, lasting for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers, and stacking infinitely. Additionally, gain {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} equal to {{as|10% '''total''' movement speed}}.

Transmute: Chaos.name: Transmute: Chaos
Transmute: Chaos.description: Gain two completely random augments, excluding the other two offerings in your current assortment.

Ultimate Awakening.name: Ultimate Awakening
Ultimate Awakening.description: Casting your ultimate ability resets the {{sti|cooldowns}} of all your basic abilities and grants you 300 basic ability haste for 15 seconds (20 second cooldown). Additionally, gain 30 ultimate haste.

Ultimate Revolution.name: Ultimate Revolution
Ultimate Revolution.description: Casting your ultimate ability resets its {{sti|cooldown}} immediately after its effect {{tt|starts|For instant-cast spells}} or has {{tt|elapsed|For duration-based spells}} (75 second cooldown, reset upon death).

Upgrade Mikael's Blessing.name: Upgrade Mikael's Blessing
Upgrade Mikael's Blessing.description:
Upgrades {{ii|Mikael's Blessing}}, reducing the cooldown of {{nie|Purify}} to 45 seconds and empowering its active to instead affect you and all nearby allied champions, {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} all targets of {{tip|crowd control}} (excluding {{tip|Airborne}}), {{tip|heal|healing}} them for {{pp|150 to 450}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}, and granting them 65% {{tip|tenacity}} for 3 seconds. Additionally, you are granted {{ii|Mikael's Blessing}} for free.

''If you already have {{ii|Mikael's Blessing}}, gain {{g|2300}} instead. If your inventory is full, the item will be granted as soon as a slot in the inventory is available.

Windspeaker's Blessing.name: Windspeaker's Blessing
Windspeaker's Blessing.description: Your or allies' {{tip|heal|heals}} and {{tip|shield|shields}} on yourself, or your heals and shields on allies, grant the target {{pp|30 to 60}} {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}} for 3 seconds.

Cerberus.name: Cerberus
Cerberus.description: Gain the {{ri|Hail of Blades}} and {{ri|Press the Attack}} keystone runes.

Earthwake.name: Earthwake
Earthwake.description:
{{tip|Dash|Dashing}} or {{tip|blink|blinking}} causes you to leave behind a trail {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} from the location you moved to your destination that detonates after {{fd|0.75}} seconds in a 300 radius, dealing {{as|{{pp|70 to 210}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 125% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|physical damage}} per explosion to enemies hit, reduced to 70% against {{tip|minions}}. Enemies can only be affected once every second from all cast instances, and the maximum trigger range is 2000 units.

This augment is only offered to up to 2 players on each team for a given game.

Orbital Laser.name: Orbital Laser
Orbital Laser.description:
Replaces the summoner spell in the slot not occupied by {{si|Flash}} with ''{{si|Orbital Laser}}''.

[[File:Orbital Laser augment spell.png|20px|link=]] {{sbc|Orbital Laser:}} Call upon an orbital laser to fire down on the target location after {{fd|2.5}} seconds, immediately dealing {{as|true damage}} equal to the {{as|25% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} then {{as|{{pp|60 to 100}} magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 3 seconds to enemies within a 550 radius, up to a total of {{as|{{pp|60*6 to 100*6}}|magic damage}}. Deals 70% damage to {{tip|minions}}.

This augment is only offered to up to 1 player on each team for a given game.

Pandora's Box.name: Pandora's Box
Pandora's Box.description: Your current augments transform into an equal number of completely random Prismatic ones.

Stackosaurus Rex.name: Stackosaurus Rex
Stackosaurus Rex.description: Increase the number of permanent stacks you gain from abilities by 75%.

Trueshot Prodigy.name: Trueshot Prodigy
Trueshot Prodigy.description:
Upon damaging an enemy while located at over {{tt|700 units away|center-to-edge}} at the time of the hit, cast {{cai|Trueshot Barrage|Ezreal}} in their direction. The barrage deals {{as|{{pp|100 to 350}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through (15 second cooldown).

This augment is only offered to up to 1 player on each team for a given game.
